      • showHelp

        public void showHelp(java.lang.String page,
                     java.lang.String location)
        Loads given page to help view.
        Parameters:
        page - Page name. Not that, this doesn't include the file extension.
        location - Location within the page. This can be null for start of page.

      • addModalLayer

        public void addModalLayer(java.lang.String id)
        Adds a modal layer to the main screen. This will disable all inputs to the screen.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the modal layer. This is used to remove the layer when requested again.

      • removeModalLayer

        public void removeModalLayer(java.lang.String id)
        Removes the modal layer from the main screen. This will enable all inputs to the screen.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the modal layer.
